comments:
After i did a copy&paste in a java-editor, I launched the show source of 
selected elements only feature.
I cannot provide a reproduceable testcase, but i hope it's useful.

Version 20020125

Cannot reproduce in I-20020205. Have tried several corner cases. Given the 
scenario, this can only happen if a child document cannot be created. As the 
child document creation is based on the range indicator which is managed as a 
position, there are two possible issues: 1) position updating problem caused be 
the paste operation 2) timing issue, i.e. the position is not yet updated. 2) 
is unlikely as the whole job is done in the UI thread. Regarding 1), we haven't 
seen any similar problem being reported. Need a reproducible case.
No comparable reports since then. Closed.
